content: arania is a pretty easy to make 10 inch square and perfect for using up your leftover little balls of yarn you may use any yarn you like i used stylecraft special dk with a 4mm hook if you are going to use a worsted /aran weight yarn with a 5 5mm hook it will give you a 12 inch square you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme which are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts per round used this is based on ssdk if you use a worsted /aran weight yarn you ll need approx 20% more yarn the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio there are also directions given for one colour in the pdf all my squares are made to fit together happy hooking
